LanguageData.MFI_ExtortionDemand: {0}, {1} of {2}, contacts you on the Comms Console. Based on your proximity to their {3} {4}, HE says you are encroaching on their terrain.\n\nHECAP says HE is willing to overlook this transgression for a modest fee of {5} silver. HECAP adds that failure to pay will be met with aggression.
